events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to get a refund because this product is not what I paid for.
The system automatically categorized the issue as a Refund request based on keywords in the customer's message.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer regarding the incorrect item received.
Hello! I’m sorry for the inconvenience caused by receiving the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo showing the wrong item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order immediately and send you a confirmation email.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the fast action and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and see if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund was received and there were no further issues, we are now closing this support case.
